message: Let's be reasonable, I'm willing to share fairly
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation will benefit you more than me in the next round.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit
I'm willing to increase my offer slightly, but I still believe a 65/35 split is fairer given the inflation.
Inflation is hurting both of us, let's meet in the middle
We're running out of time, and the inflation is really starting to hurt me. A 70/30 split is my final offer, or we both lose everything.
